info.name: Intercom API
info.description: A collection of examples of how to interact with the various endpoints of the Intercom API based on https://developers.intercom.com/reference

item.name: Create or Update User (Create or Update Users)
Updating the Last Seen Time (Update for Last Seen Time)
Companies and Users (Associate a Company with a User)
Companies and Users (Remove a User from a Company)
List by Email (List Users by Email)
Permanently delete a user (Permanently delete users)
List Customer Data Attributes (List of your customer data attributes including archived)
List Company Data Attributes (List of your company data attributes including archived)
Convert a Visitor to a Lead (Lead Convert)
Convert a Visitor to a User
View a Company (View Request and Response)
List by Tag or Segment (List by tag)
View an Admin (Retrieve a single admin)
View a Team (Retrieve a single team)
Tag or Untag Users, Companies & Leads (Contacts) (Tag)
Tag or Untag Users, Companies & Leads (Contacts)
List Tags for an App (List Tag)
List Notes for a User (User ID)
View User Event Summaries (Get summary count of user events)
User or Lead Initiated Conversation (User Initiated Message)
Get a Single Conversation (Get a Single Conversation)
List Conversations (List Open Conversations for a Particular Admin)
Replying to a Conversation (Reply with and Without Attachments)
Replying to a Conversation (Reply with a note)
Replying to Users Last Conversation (Replying to the Users Most Recent Conversation)

body.raw:
{
  "intercom_user_id": "536e564f316c83104c000020",
  "body": "Let me know if you have any more questions!",
  "type": "admin",
  "admin_id": "1234",
  "message_type": "comment"
}

item.name: Assigning a Conversation to Unassigned (Assign to Unassigned)
Run assignment rules on a conversation (Assign based on assignment rules)
Marking a Conversation as Read (Mark a Conversation as Read)
Adding to group conversations as admin (Adding a customer to a group conversation)
Adding to group conversations as customer (Adding a customer to a group conversation as customer)
Deleting from group conversations (Deleting a customer from a group conversation)
Closing a conversation (Closing a Conversation Without Reply)
Closing a conversation (Closing a Conversation With Reply)
